en.definition:
It is the proportion of all classifications that were correct, whether positive or negative. 
Emails example: In the spam classification example, accuracy measures the fraction of all emails correctly classified.

sw.definition:
Ni sehemu ya uainishaji wote ambao ulikuwa sahihi, iwe unafaa au haufai. 
 Mifano ya barua pepe: Kwenye mfano wa uainishaji wa taka, usahihi hupima sehemu za barua pepe zote zilizoainishwa kwa usahihi.

af.definition:
Dit is die gedeelte van alle klassifikasies wat korrek was, ongeag of dit positief of negatief was. 
 E-posvoorbeeld: In die strooiposklassifikasievoorbeeld meet akkuraatheid die breukdeel van alle e-posse wat korrek geklassifiseer is.

xh.definition:
Ngumlinganiselo wazo zonke iindidi zokuhlela ebezichanekile, nokuba bezilungile okanye zingalunganga. 
 Umzekelo we-imeyile: Kumzekelo wokuhlelwa kwe-spam, ukuchaneka kulinganisa iqhezu lazo zonke ii-imeyile ezihlelwe ngokuchanekileyo.

zu.definition:
Kuyisilinganiso sakho konke ukuhlunga obekunembile, kungakhathaliseki ukuthi kuhle noma kubi. 
 Isibonelo sama-imeyili: Esibonelweni sokuhlungwa kukagaxekile, ukunemba kulinganisa ingxenye yawo wonke ama-imeyili ahlungwe ngokunembile.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Google for Developers, Machine Learning Crash Course entry 'Classification: Accuracy Precision Recall'

en.definition: A special case of machine learning in which a learning algorithm can interactively query a human user (or some other information source), to label new data points with the desired outputs.

sw.definition: Taaluma maalum ya mashine kujifunza ambapo algoriti ya mafunzo inaweza kutagusana na mtumiaji kwa vidokezo (au chanzo kingine cha maelezo), ili kuwekea lebo viwango vipya vya data kwenye matokeo yanayokusudiwa.

af.definition: ’n Spesiale geval van masjienleer waarin ’n leeralgoritme interaktief navraag by ’n menslike gebruiker (of ’n ander inligtingbron) kan doen om nuwe datapunte met die verlangde uitsette te etiketteer.

xh.definition: Imeko ekhethekileyo yokufunda koomatshini apho i-algorithm yokufunda inokubuza ngokudibeneyo kumsebenzisi ongumntu (okanye omnye umthombo wolwazi), ukulebheyila amanqaku amatsha edatha kunye neziphumo ezifunwayo.

zu.definition: Isimo esikhethekile sokufunda ngomshini lapho i-algorithm yokufunda ingabuza ngokuxhumana nomsebenzisi ongumuntu (noma omunye umthombo wolwazi), ukulebula amaphoyinti edatha amasha ngemiphumela efiselekayo.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Active learning (machine learning)'

en.definition: Aims to steer AI systems toward a person's or group's intended goals, preferences, and ethical principles. An AI system is considered aligned if it advances the intended objectives. A misaligned AI system pursues unintended objectives.

sw.definition: Hukusudia kuelekeza mifumo ya AI kulingana na kanuni za maadili, malengo na mapendeleo ya mtu binafsi au ya kikundi. Mfumo wa AI unachukuliwa kuwa unalingana iwapo unatekeleza malengo yanayokusudiwa. Mfumo wa AI ambao haulingani hufuata malengo yasiyokusudiwa.

af.definition: Dit is daarop gemik om AI-stelsels in die rigting van ’n persoon of groep se bedoelde doelwitte, voorkeure en etiese beginsels te stuur. ’n AI-stelsel word as gerig beskou as dit die bedoelde doelwitte bevorder. ’n Wangerigte AI-stelsel streef onbedoelde doelwitte na.

xh.definition: Ijolise ekuqhubeni iinkqubo ze-AI ukuya kwiinjongo ezijoliswe kumntu okanye iqela, ukhetho, nemigaqo yokuziphatha. Inkqubo ye-AI ithathwa njengelungelelanisiweyo ukuba iqhubela phambili iinjongo ekujoliswe kuzo. Inkqubo ye-AI engalunganga ilandela iinjongo ezingalindelekanga.

zu.definition: Imigomo yokuqondisa amasistimu we-AI emigomweni ehloselwe umuntu noma iqembu, okuncanyelwayo, nemithetho yokuziphatha. Isistimu ye-AI ibhekwa njengeqondanisiwe uma ithuthukisa imigomo ehlosiwe. Isistimu ye-AI engaqondanisiwe kahle iya emigomweni engahlosiwe.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'AI alignment'

en.definition: A systematic and repeatable errors in a computer system that create "unfair" outcomes, such as "privileging" one category over another in ways different from the intended function of the algorithm.

sw.definition: Hitilafu za kimfumo na zinazoweza kujirudia kwenye mfumo wa kompyuta zinazoleta matokeo "yasiyo na usawa", kama vile "kuipa kipaumbele" aina moja dhidi ya nyingine katika njia zilizo tofauti na utendakazi wa algoriti unaokusudiwa.

af.definition: ’n Sistematiese en herhaalbare fout in ’n rekenaarstelsel wat “onregverdige” uitkomste skep, soos om een kategorie bo ’n ander te “bevoordeel” op maniere wat van die bedoelde funksie van die algoritme afwyk.

xh.definition: Iimpazamo ezicwangcisiweyo neziphindaphindwayo kwinkqubo yekhompyutha edala iziphumo "ezingalunganga", ezifana "nokubeka phambili" olunye udidi ngaphezulu kolunye ngeendlela ezahlukileyo kumsebenzi ocetyiweyo we-algorithm.

zu.definition: Amaphutha wesistimu naphindekayo kusistimu yekhompyutha asungula imiphumela "engafanele", "njengokuphakamisa" isigaba esithile ngaphezu kwesinye ngezindlela ezihlukile emsebenzini obuhlosiwe we-algorithm.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Algorithmic bias'

en.definition: The principle that the factors that influence the decisions made by algorithms should be visible, or transparent, to the people who use, regulate, and are affected by systems that employ those algorithms.

sw.definition: Kanuni inayoeleza kuwa mambo yanayoathiri uamuzi unaofanywa na algoriti unapaswa uwe dhahiri au uwe wazi kwa watu wanaotumia, kudhibiti na wanaoathiriwa na mifumo inayotumia algoriti hizo.

af.definition: Die beginsel dat die faktore wat die besluite beïnvloed wat deur algoritmes geneem word, sigbaar, of deursigtig, moet wees vir die mense wat stelsels wat daardie algoritmes benut, gebruik en reguleer en daardeur geraak word.

xh.definition: Umgaqo wokuba izinto ezichaphazela izigqibo ezenziwe ziialgorithm kufuneka zibonakale, okanye zibe lubala kubantu abazisebenzisayo, abazilawulayo, nabachaphazelekayo ziinkqubo ezisebenzisa ezo zixhobo.

zu.definition: Umthetho wokuthi izici ezinegalelo ezinqumweni ezenziwa ama-algorithms kufanele zibonakale, noma zingafihleki, kubantu abasebenzisa, baqondise, futhi bathintwe amasistimu asebenzisa lawo ma-algorithm.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Algorithmic transparency'

en.definition: In its broadest sense, is intelligence exhibited by machines, particularly computer systems. It is a field of research in computer science that develops and studies methods and software that enable machines to perceive their environment and use learning and intelligence to take actions that maximize their chances of achieving defined goals.

sw.definition: Katika dhana yake pana zaidi, ni umahiri unaoonyeshwa na mashine, hasa mifumo ya kompyuta. Ni taaluma ya utafiti katika sayansi ya kompyuta inayobuni na kutafiti njia pamoja na programu inayoziwezesha mashine kutambua mazingira yake na kutumia mafunzo pamoja na umahiri ili kuchukua hatua zinazoongeza uwezekano wake wa kufikia malengo yaliyokusudiwa.

af.definition: Dit is in die wydste betekenis intelligensie wat deur masjiene, veral rekenaarstelsels, getoon word. Dit is ’n navorsingsveld in rekenaarwetenskap wat studiemetodes en sagteware ontwikkel wat dit vir masjiene moontlik maak om hul omgewing waar te neem en leer en intelligensie te gebruik om handelinge uit te voer wat hul kans so groot moontlik maak om gedefinieerde doelwitte te bereik.

xh.definition: Xa ichazwa ngeyona ndlele igabalala, bubukrelekrele obubonakaliswa ngoomatshini, ingakumbi iinkqubo zekhompyutha. Licandelo lophando kwisayensi yekhompyutha ephuhlisa ize ifunda iindlela nesoftware eyenza ukuba oomatshini babone okuwungqongileyo kwaye usebenzise ukufunda nobukrelekrele ukuthatha iintshukumo ezandisa amathuba awo okufikelela kwiinjongo ezichaziweyo.

zu.definition: Ngomqondo obanzi, ukuhlakanipha okubonakaliswa imishini, ikakhulu amasistimu ekhompyutha. Iyinkundla yocwaningo lwesayensi yekhompyutha esungula futhi icwaninge izindlela nesofthiwe evumela imishini ukuba ibone indawo futhi isebenzise ukufunda nokuhlakanipha ukuze ithathe izinyathelo ezikhuphula amathuba ayo okufinyelela imigomo ebekiwe.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Artificial intelligence'

en.definition: In machine learning, a neural network (also artificial neural network or neural net, abbreviated ANN or NN) is a model inspired by the structure and function of biological neural networks in animal brains. An ANN consists of connected units or nodes called artificial neurons, which loosely model the neurons in the brain.

sw.definition: Katika mchakato wa mashine kujifunza, mtandao unaoiga hisia na ubongo (pia hujulikana kama mtandao bandia unaoiga hisia na ubongo au mtandao wa neva, kwa kifupi ANN au NN) ni mfumo unaowezeshwa na muundo pamoja na utendakazi wa mifumo ya neva ya kibiolojia katika ubongo wa wanyama. ANN inajumuisha vitengo au vifaa kwenye mtandao vinavyoitwa neva bandia, ambazo huiga kwa kiasi fulani neva zilizo katika ubongo.

af.definition: In masjienleer is ’n neurale netwerk (ook kunsmatige neurale netwerk of neurale net, afgekort as KNN of NN) ’n model wat geïnspireer is deur die struktuur en funksie van biologiese neurale netwerke in die breine van diere. ’n KNN bestaan uit gekoppelde eenhede of nodusse genaamd kunsmatige neurone, wat losweg na die neurone in die brein gemodelleer is.

xh.definition: Ekufundweni koomatshini, i-neural nethwekhi (ne-artificial neural nethwekhi okanye i-neural net, i-ANN xa ifinyeziwe okanye i-NN) yimodeli engumzekelo ekhuthazwa sisakhiwo nomsebenzi we-biological neural networks kubuchopho bezilwanyana. I-ANN iqulathe iiyunithi ezidityanisiweyo okanye iindawo ezibizwa ngokuba zii-neuron ezenziweyo, ezibonisa ngokukhululekileyo imithambo-luvo ebuchotsheni.

zu.definition: Ekufundeni komshini, ineural network (ebizwa nangokuthi yi-artificial neural network noma ineural net, enesifinyezo esithi ANN noma NN) iyimodeli esekelwa ukwakheka nokusebenza kwamabiological neural network ebuchosheni bezilwane. I-ANN iqukethe amayunithi noma amanodi axhumene abizwa ngokuthi ama-artificial neuron, alingisa amaneuron asebuchosheni.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Neural network (machine learning)'

en.definition:
Refers to a car that is capable of operating with reduced or no human input. 
Synonyms: self-driving car, driverless car, robotaxi, robotic car or robo-car.

sw.definition:
Hurejelea gari linaloweza kujiendesha bila dereva au kwa kudhibitiwa kidogo na binadamu. 
 Visawe: gari linalojiendesha, gari lisilo na dereva, taksi inayoendeshwa na roboti, gari inayoendeshwa na roboti au gari ya roboti.

af.definition:
Dit verwys na ’n motor wat in staat is om met verminderde of geen menslike insette nie te werk. 
 Sinonieme: selfbestuurmotor, bestuurderlose motor, robottaxi, robotiese motor of robotmotor.

xh.definition:
Ibhekisa kwimoto ekwaziyo ukusebenza ngegalelo lomntu elinciphileyo okanye kungekho galelo lomntu. 
 Izithethantonye: imoto eziqhubayo, imoto engenamqhubi, i-robotaxi, imoto yerobhothi okanye i-robo-car.

zu.definition:
Zibhekisela emotweni ekwazi ukuhamba ngokuqondisa okuncane komuntu noma ngaphandle kwako. 
 Amagama afanayo: imoto ezishayelayo, imoto engenamshayeli, irobotaxi, imoto eyirobhothi noma irobo-car.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Self-driving car'

en.definition: Describes the relationship between a model's complexity, the accuracy of its predictions, and how well it can make predictions on previously unseen data that were not used to train the model.

sw.definition: Hufafanua uhusiano kati ya uchangamano wa mfumo, usahihi wa utabiri wake na kiwango ambacho unaweza kufanya utabiri kuhusiana na data isiyoonekana awali ambayo haikutumika kufunza mfumo huo.

af.definition: Dit beskryf die verhouding tussen ’n model se kompleksiteit, die akkuraatheid van die voorspellings daarvan, en hoe goed dit voorspellings kan doen op grond van data wat nie vroeër gesien is nie en nie gebruik is om die model op te lei nie.

xh.definition: Ichaza unxulumano phakathi kokuntsokotha kwemodeli, ukuchaneka koqikelelo lwayo, nendlela enokwenza ngayo uqikelelo kwidatha ebingabonwa ngaphambili engazange isetyenziswe ekuqeqesheni imodeli.

zu.definition: Ichaza ubuhlobo phakathi kobunkimbinkimbi bemodeli, ukunemba kokuqagela kwayo, nendlela ekwazi ukuqagela kahle ngayo kudatha engakaze ibonwe ngaphambilini engazange isetshenziswe ekuqeqesheni leyo modeli.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Bias%E2%80%93variance tradeoff'

en.definition: A software application or web interface that is designed to mimic human conversation through text or voice interactions. Also spelled as chat bot.

sw.definition: Programu au kiolesura cha wavuti kilichobuniwa ili kuiga mazungumzo ya binadamu kupitia mitagusano ya sauti au maandishi. Pia huitwa kijibu gumzo.

af.definition: ’n Sagtewareapp of webkoppelvlak wat ontwerp is om menslike gesprek deur teks- of steminteraksies na te boots. In Engels gespel as “chatbot” of “chat bot”.

xh.definition: Iaplikheyshini yesoftware okanye ujongano lwewebhu eyilelwe ukulinganisa incoko yabantu ngokubhaliweyo okanye ukusetyenziswa kwelizwi. Ikwapelwe ngokuthi chat bot.

zu.definition: I-application yesofthiwe noma isixhumi esibonakalayo sewebhu esiklanyelwe ukulingisa ingxoxo yabantu ngombhalo noma ngokuxhumana ngezwi. Iphinde ibhalwe nangokuthi chat bot.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'List of chatbots'

en.definition:
An interdisciplinary field that deals with how computers can be made to gain high-level understanding from digital images or videos. From the perspective of engineering, it seeks to automate tasks that the human visual system can do.
As a scientific discipline, computer vision is concerned with the theory behind artificial systems that extract information from images.

sw.definition:
Taaluma ya mada anuai inayohusiana na jinsi kompyuta zinavyoweza kupewa uwezo wa kupata uelewa wa kiwango cha juu kwenye picha au video dijitali. Kulingana na mtazamo wa uhandisi, hulenga kufanya kiotomatiki majukumu ambayo mfumo wa kuona wa binadamu unaweza kufanya.
 Kama taaluma ya kisayansi, uwezo wa kompyuta kuona unahusiana na dhana ya mifumo bandia inayodondoa maelezo kutoka kwenye picha.

af.definition:
’n Interdissiplinêre vakgebied wat gaan oor hoe rekenaars gemaak kan word om hoëvlakbegrip van digitale prente of video’s te kry. Uit ’n ingenieursoogpunt is dit daarop gemik om take te outomatiseer wat die menslike visuele stelsel kan verrig.
 As ’n wetenskaplike dissipline is rekenaarvisie gemoeid met die teorie agter kunsmatige stelsels wat inligting uit prente haal.

xh.definition:
Inkalo yezifundo ezahlukeneyo ejongene nendlela iikhompyutha ezinokuthi zenziwe ngayo ukufumana ukuqonda okuphezulu kwimifanekiso yedijithali okanye iividiyo. Ngokwembono yobunjineli, ifuna ukuzenzela imisebenzi enokwenziwa yinkqubo yokubona yomntu.
 Njengoqeqesho lwezenzululwazi, umbono wekhompyutha ujongene nethiyori esemva kweenkqubo ezenziweyo ezikhupha inkcazelo kwimifanekiso.

zu.definition:
Inkundla eyizinhlobonhlobo egxile endleleni okungenziwa ngayo ukuba amakhompyutha athole ukuqonda kwezinga eliphezulu ngezithombe namavidiyo edijithali. Ngokombono wonjiniyela, ihlose ukwenza imisebenzi eyenziwa isistimu yokubuka komuntu.
 Ngokomthetho wesayensi, ukubona kwekhompyutha kukhathazeke ngendaba yamasistimu okwenziwa adonsa imininingwane ezithombeni.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Computer vision'

en.definition: A type of artificial intelligence (AI) that can simulate human conversation thanks to natural language processing (NLP) technologies.

sw.definition: Aina ya akiliunde (AI) ambayo inaweza kuiga mazungumzo ya binadamu kupitia teknolojia za uchakataji wa lugha kwa matumizi ya kompyuta (NLP).

af.definition: ’n Soort kunsmatige intelligensie (AI) wat menslike gesprekke kan naboots danksy tegnologie vir natuurlike taalverwerking (NTV).

xh.definition: Uhlobo lwe-artificial intelligence (AI) ekwazi ukulinganisa incoko yabantu ngoncedo lobuchwephesha bokulungiswa kolwimi lwendalo (NLP).

zu.definition: Uhlobo lobuchwepheshe bokwakhiwe (AI) olungalingisa ingxoxo yabantu ngenxa yobuchwepheshe bokucubungula kolimi lwemvelo (NLP).

attribution.text: Adapted from the Conversational Ai entry on Google Cloud

en.definition: A process by which personal data is altered in such a way that a data subject can no longer be identified directly or indirectly, either by the data controller alone or in collaboration with any other party.

sw.definition: Mchakato ambapo data binafsi inabadilishwa katika njia ambayo mmiliki wa data hawezi tena kutambuliwa moja kwa moja au kwa njia isiyo ya moja kwa moja na mdhibiti wa data pekee au akishirikiana na mshirika mwingine.

af.definition: ’n Proses waardeur persoonlike data só gewysig word dat ’n datasubjek nie meer direk of indirek deur óf die databeheerder alleen, óf in samewerking met enige ander party geïdentifiseer kan word nie.

xh.definition: Inkqubo apho idatha yomntu iguqulwa khona ngendlela yokuba umxholo wedatha ungasakwazi ukuchongwa ngokuthe ngqo okanye ngokungathanga ngqo, nokuba ngumlawuli wedatha yedwa okanye ngokubambisana nalo naliphi na elinye iqela.

zu.definition: Inqubo yokuguqulwa kwedatha yomuntu ngendlela yokuthi umnikazi wedatha angabe esakwazi ukutholwa ngokuqondile noma ngokungaqondile, kungaba ngesilawuli sedatha sisodwa noma sihlangene nanoma yikuphi okunye.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Data anonymization'

en.definition: A statistical technique which allows maximum likelihood estimation from incomplete data.

sw.definition: Mbinu ya kitakwimu inayowezesha ukadiriaji wa juu wa uwezekano fulani unaotokana na data ambayo si kamili.

af.definition: ’n Statistiese tegniek wat ’n skatting van die grootste waarskynlikheid uit onvolledige data moontlik maak.

xh.definition: Ubuchule beenkcukacha-manani obuvumela uqikelelo lokunokwenzeka okukhulu okusuka kwidatha engaphelelanga.

zu.definition: Ikhono lezibalo elivumela ukulinganisa kokuqagela okukhulu ngedatha engaphelele.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Data augmentation'

en.definition: It is the practice of matching anonymous data (also known as de-identified data) with publicly available information, or auxiliary data, in order to discover the person the data belong to. Also known as 'data re-identification'.

sw.definition: Ni mbinu ya kulinganisha data ambayo utambulisho wake umefichwa (pia hujulikana kama data isiyotambulishwa) na taarifa zinazopatikana kwa umma au data ya ziada, ili kumgundua mtu ambaye anahusiana na data hiyo. Pia hujulikana kama 'kutambua upya data'.

af.definition: Dit is die praktyk om anonieme data (ook bekend as gedeïdentifiseerde data) te pas by inligting wat publiek beskikbaar is, of aanvullende data, om uit te vind aan watter persoon die data behoort. Dit is ook bekend as “dataheridentifisering”.

xh.definition: Isenzo sokuthelekisa idatha engachazwanga (ekwabizwa ngokuba yidatha eyekisiweyo ukuchonga) enenkcukacha ezifumaneka esidlangalaleni, okanye iinkcukacha ezincedisayo, ukuze kufunyanwe ukuba ngubani umntu wale datha. Ikwabizwa ngokuba 'kukuphinda kuchongwe idatha'.

zu.definition: Inqubo yokuqhathanisa idatha engaziwa (eyaziwa nangokuthi yide-identified data) enemininingwane etholakala esidlangalaleni, noma idatha eseceleni, ukuze kutholakale umuntu ongumnikazi waleyo datha. Yaziwa nangokuthi 'yidata re-identification'.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Data re-identification'

en.definition: An interdisciplinary subfield of computer science and statistics with an overall goal of extracting information (with intelligent methods) from a data set and transforming the information into a comprehensible structure for further use.

sw.definition: Taaluma ndogo inayohusisha mada anuai za sayansi ya kompyuta na takwimu yenye lengo la jumla la kudondoa taarifa (kwa kutumia njia mahiri) kutoka kwenye kifungu cha data na kubadilisha taarifa kuwa muundo unaoeleweka kwa matumizi zaidi.

af.definition: ’n Interdissiplinêre subvakgebied van rekenaarwetenskap en statistiek waarvan die oorkoepelende doel is om inligting (met intelligente metodes) uit ’n datastel te haal en die inligting tot ’n verstaanbare struktuur te omskep vir verdere gebruik.

xh.definition: Icandelo elingaphantsi kwezifundo zesayensi yekhompyutha neenkcukacha-manani enenjongo yokukhupha inkcazelo (ngeendlela ezikrelekrele) ukusuka kwiseti yedatha nokuguqula inkcazelo kwisakhiwo esiqondakalayo ukuze sisetyenziswe ngakumbi.

zu.definition: Inkundla encane eyizinhlobonhlobo yesayensi yekhompyutha nezibalo enomgomo wokudonsa imininingwane (ngezindlela ezihlakaniphile) kusethi yedatha nokuguqula leyo mininingwane ibe yisakhiwo esiqondakalayo ukuze isetshenziswe.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Data mining'

en.definition: Deep learning refers to a class of machine learning algorithms in which a hierarchy of layers is used to transform input data into a slightly more abstract and composite representation. For example, in an image recognition model, the raw input may be an image (represented as a tensor of pixels). The first representational layer may attempt to identify basic shapes such as lines and circles, the second layer may compose and encode arrangements of edges, the third layer may encode a nose and eyes, and the fourth layer may recognize that the image contains a face.

sw.definition: Mafunzo ya kina hurejelea aina ya algoriti za mashine kujifunza ambapo madaraja ya safu mbalimbali hutumika kubadilisha data inayowekwa kuwa katika taswira changamano na ya kidhahania zaidi. Kwa mfano, katika muundo wa kutambua picha, data ambayo haijachanganuliwa inayowekwa inaweza kuwa picha (inayoonyeshwa kama kipengee cha pikseli). Safu ya kwanza ya taswira inaweza kujaribu kutambua maumbo ya msingi kama vile mistari na miduara, safu ya pili inaweza kutunga na kusimba mipangilio ya kingo, safu ya tatu inaweza kusimba pua na macho na safu ya nne inaweza kutambua kuwa picha hiyo ina sura.

af.definition: Diepleer verwys na ’n klas masjienleeralgoritmes waarin ’n hiërargie lae gebruik word om invoerdata tot ’n effens meer abstrakte en saamgestelde verteenwoordiging te omskep. Byvoorbeeld, in ’n prentherkenningmodel kan die onverwerkte invoer ’n prent wees (wat as ’n tensor pieksels verteenwoordig word). Die eerste verteenwoordigende laag kan probeer om basiese vorms, soos lyne en sirkels, te identifiseer; die tweede laag kan rangskikkings van rande saamstel en enkodeer; die derde laag kan neuse en oë enkodeer; en die vierde laag kan herken dat die prent ’n gesig bevat.

xh.definition: Ukufunda nzulu kubhekisele kwiklasi yokufunda koomatshini beealgorithm apho ukulandelelana kweeleya kusetyenziselwa ukuguqula idatha efakiweyo ibe yinto engabonakaliyo nomboniso odibeneyo. Umzekelo, kwimodeli yokuqaphela umfanekiso, umthombo wokufakwayo unokuba ngumfanekiso (omelwe njengetensor yeepikseli). Ileya yokuqala omeleyo unokuzama ukuchonga iimilo ezisisiseko ezifana nemigca kunye nezangqa, ileya yesibini inokuqamba ize idibanise ulungelelwaniso lwemiphetho, ileya yesithathu inokubhaqa impumlo namehlo, ize ileya yesine iqonde ukuba umfanekiso uqulathe ubuso.

zu.definition: Ideep learning ibhekisela esigabeni sama-algorithm okufunda komshini lapho amazinga ezendlalelo esetshenziselwa ukuguqula idatha efakwayo ibe yisimo esifihlekile nesididiyelwe. Ngokwesibonelo, kumodeli yokuqashelwa kwesithombe, okufakwayo okungahlungiwe kungase kube isithombe (esimelelwa yitensor yamaphikseli). Isendlalelo sokuqala esimelelayo singase sizame ukubona izinhlobo zezinto ezivamile njengolayini neziyingi, isendlalelo sesibili singase sibhale futhi sifake ikhodi ekuhlelweni kwamachopho, isendlalelo sesithathu singase sifake ikhodi yekhala namehlo, kanti isendlalelo sesine singase sibone ukuthi isithombe siqukethe ubuso.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Deep learning'

en.definition: Images, videos, or audio which are edited or generated using artificial intelligence tools, and which may depict real or non-existent people. They are a type of synthetic media.

sw.definition: Picha, video au sauti ambazo zinahaririwa au kutayarishwa kwa kutumia zana za akiliunde na ambazo zinaweza kuonyesha watu halisi au wasio halisi. Ni aina ya maudhui sanisi.

af.definition: Prente, video’s of oudio wat met gebruik van nutsgoed met kunsmatige intelligensie geredigeer of gegenereer is, en wat regte of niebestaande mense kan uitbeeld. Dit is ’n soort sintetiese media.

xh.definition: Imifanekiso, iividiyo, okanye okumanyelwayo okuedithiweyo okanye okuveliswa kusetyenziswa izixhobo zobukrelekrele ezenziweyo, ezinokuthi zimele abantu bokwenyani okanye abangekhoyo. Ziluhlobo lwemidiya eyenziweyo.

zu.definition: Izithombe, amavidiyo, noma okulalelwayo okuhlelwa noma kukhiqizwe ngamathuluzi wobuchwepheshe bokwakhiwe, futhi okungabonisa abantu bangempela noma abangekho ngokoqobo. Kuyizinhlobo zesynthetic media.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Deepfake'

en.definition: Either refers to an artificial intelligence (AI) system over which it is possible for humans to retain intellectual oversight, or refers to the methods to achieve this.

sw.definition: Hurejelea mfumo wa akiliunde (AI) ambao wanadamu wanaweza kuendelea kusimamia na kudhibiti au hurejelea njia za kufikia lengo hili.

af.definition: Dit verwys óf na ’n stelsel met kunsmatige intelligensie (AI) waaroor dit vir mense moontlik is om intellektuele toesig te behou, óf dit verwys na die metodes om dit reg te kry.

xh.definition: Ibhekisa kwinkqubo yobukrelekrele bokwenziwa (AI) apho kunokwenzeka ukuba abantu bagcine ukongamela ubukrelekrele, okanye ibhekisa kwiindlela zokwazi ukuphumeza oku.

zu.definition: Ibhekisela kusistimu yobuchwepheshe bokwakhiwe (AI) eyenza kwenzeke ukuthi abantu baqhubeke beqondisa ngokuhlakanipha, noma kubhekisela ezindleleni zokukufinyelela lokhu.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Explainable artificial intelligence'

en.definition: Fairness in machine learning refers to the various attempts at correcting algorithmic bias in automated decision processes based on machine learning models. Decisions made by computers after a machine-learning process may be considered unfair if they were based on variables considered sensitive. For example gender, ethnicity, sexual orientation or disability.

sw.definition: Usawa katika mchakato wa mashine kujifunza hurejelea majaribio mbalimbali ya kusahihisha upendeleo wa kialgoriti katika michakato ya uamuzi wa kiotomatiki kulingana na mifumo ya mashine kujifunza. Uamuzi unaofanywa na kompyuta baada ya mchakato wa mashine kujifunza unaweza kuchukuliwa kuwa hauna usawa iwapo ulitokana na vibadala vinavyochukuliwa kuwa ni nyeti. Kwa mfano, jinsia, ukabila, mwelekeo wa kingono au ulemavu.

af.definition: Regverdigheid in masjienleer verwys na die verskillende pogings om algoritmiese vooroordeel in geoutomatiseerde besluitnemingprosesse op grond van masjienleermodelle reg te stel. Besluite wat ná ’n masjienleerproses deur rekenaars geneem word, kan as onregverdig beskou word as hulle gegrond is op veranderlikes wat as sensitief beskou word. Byvoorbeeld gender, etnisiteit, seksuele oriëntasie of gestremdheid.

xh.definition: I-Fairness ekufundweni koomatshini ibhekiselele kwiinzame ezahlukeneyo zokulungisa ukuthatha icala kweealgorithm kwiinkqubo zezigqibo ezizenzekelayo ezisekelwe kwiimodeli zokufundwa koomatshini. Izigqibo ezenziwe ziikhompyutha emva kwenkqubo yokufunda koomatshini zinokujongwa njengezingafanelekanga ukuba bezisekelwe kwizinto ezithathwa njengezinovakalelo. Umzekelo isini, ubuhlanga, ukuziqhelanisa ngesondo okanye ukukhubazeka.

zu.definition: Ukungachemi ekufundeni komshini kubhekisela emizamweni ehlukahlukene yokulungisa ukuchema kwama-algorithm ezinqubweni zezinqumo ezizenzekelayo ezisekelwe kumamodeli okufunda komshini. Izinqumo ezenziwa amakhompyutha ngemva kwenqubo yokufunda komshini zingase zibhekwe njengezingafanele uma zisekelwe ezingxenyekazini ezibhekwa njengezizwelayo. Ngokwesibonelo ubulili, ubuzwe, ubulili oyamaniseka nabo noma ukukhubazeka.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Fairness (machine learning)'

en.definition: A prompting strategy that includes two or more examples of the desired input and output

sw.definition: Mkakati wa udokezaji unaojumuisha mifano miwili au zaidi ya data na tokeo linalokusudiwa

af.definition: ’n Porboodskapstrategie wat twee of meer voorbeelde van die verlangde invoer en uitvoer insluit

xh.definition: Isicwangciso esiyalelayo esibandakanya imizekelo emibini okanye ngaphezulu yokufakwayo okufunekayo nesiphumo

zu.definition: Isu leprompting oluhlanganisa izibonelo ezimbili noma ngaphezulu zokufakwayo nomphumela ofunwayo

attribution.text: Adapted from a Gemini response to the prompt, 'Tell me about Few-shot prompting in AI'

en.definition: In deep learning, fine-tuning is an approach to transfer learning in which the parameters of a pre-trained model are trained on new data.

sw.definition: Katika mchakato wa mafunzo ya kina, uboreshaji ni mbinu ya kuhamisha mafunzo ambapo vigezo vya mfumo uliofunzwa awali hufunzwa kwa kutumia data mpya.

af.definition: In diepleer is fyn instelling ’n benadering om leer oor te dra waarin die parameters van ’n voorafopgeleide model met nuwe data opgelei word.

xh.definition: Ekufundeni nzulu, i-fine-tuning yindlela yokudlulisa ukufunda apho iipharamitha zemodeli eqeqeshwe kwangaphambili ziqeqeshelwe idatha entsha.

zu.definition: Ekufundeni ngokujulile, ifine-tuning iyindlela yokudlulisela ukufunda lapho amapharamitha wemodeli eqeqeshwe kusengaphambili eqeqeshelwa idatha entsha.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Fine-tuning (deep learning)'

en.definition: Artificial intelligence capable of generating text, images, videos, or other data using generative models, often in response to prompts. Generative AI models learn the patterns and structure of their input training data and then generate new data that has similar characteristics.

sw.definition: Akiliunde yenye uwezo wa kutayarisha maandishi, picha, video au data nyingine kwa kutumia mifumo zalishi, mara nyingi kwa kujibu vidokezo. Mifumo ya AI zalishi hujifunza mitindo na muundo wa data ya mafunzo inayowekwa kisha kutayarisha data mpya ambayo ina sifa kama hizo.

af.definition: Kunsmatige intelligensie wat die vermoë het om teks, prente, video’s of ander data met gebruik van generatiewe modelle te genereer, dikwels in reaksie op porboodskappe. Generatiewe-AI-modelle leer die patrone en struktuur van hul invoeropleidingdata en genereer dan nuwe data wat soortgelyke kenmerke het.

xh.definition: I-artificial intelligence ekwazi ukuvelisa umbhalo, imifanekiso, iividiyo, okanye enye idatha isebenzisa imodeli yokuzivelisela, ehlala iphendula imiyalelo. Iimodeli ze-AI Yokuvelisa zifunda iiphatheni nolwakhiwo lwedatha yoqeqesho lwazo zize emva koko zivelise idatha entsha eneempawu ezifanayo.

zu.definition: Ubuchwepheshe bokwakhiwe bukwazi ukukhiqiza umbhalo, izithombe, amavidiyo, nenye idatha ngamamodeli akhiqizayo, ngokuvamile ngokusabela emiyalelweni. Amamodeli we-AI ekhiqizayo afunda amaphethini nesakhiwo sedatha yokuqeqeshwa yokufakwayo bese ekhiqiza idatha entsha enezici ezifanayo.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Generative artificial intelligence'

en.definition: A response generated by AI which contains false or misleading information presented as fact.

sw.definition: Jibu linalotayarishwa kwa AI ambalo lina maelezo ya uongo au yanayopotosha yanayowasilishwa kuwa ya kweli.

af.definition: ’n Antwoord gegenereer deur AI wat vals of misleidende inligting bevat, maar as ’n feit voorgehou word.

xh.definition: Impendulo eveliswa yi-AI equlethe inkcazelo engeyonyani okanye elahlekisayo eboniswe njengenyaniso.

zu.definition: Impendulo ekhiqizwa yi-AI equkethe imininingwane engamanga noma edukisayo enikezwa njengeyiqiniso.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Hallucination (artificial intelligence)'

en.definition: In machine learning, HITL is used in the sense of humans aiding the computer in making the correct decisions in building a model.

sw.definition: Katika mfumo wa mashine kujifunza, HITL inatumika kwa maana ya wanadamu kusaidia kompyuta kufanya uamuzi sahihi katika kutengeneza mfumo.

af.definition: In masjienleer word MWIW gebruik in die sin van mense wat die rekenaar bystaan om die korrekte besluite te neem wanneer ’n model gebou word.

xh.definition: Ekufundeni koomatshini, i-HITL isetyenziswa kwingqiqo yabantu encedisa ikhompyutha ekwenzeni izigqibo ezichanekileyo ekwakheni imodeli.

zu.definition: Ekufundeni komshini, i-HITL isetshenziswa ngomqondo wokuthi abantu basiza ikhompyutha ekwenzeni izinqumo ezinembile ekwakheni imodeli.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Human-in-the-loop'

en.definition: A computational model capable of language generation or other natural language processing tasks. As language models, LLMs acquire these abilities by learning statistical relationships from vast amounts of text during a self-supervised and semi-supervised training process.

sw.definition: Mfumo unaotumia kompyuta unaoweza kutayarisha lugha au kutekeleza majukumu mengine ya uchakataji wa lugha kwa matumizi ya kompyuta. Ikiwa mifumo ya lugha, LLM hupata uwezo huu kwa kujifunza uhusiano wa kitakwimu kutoka kwenye kiasi kikubwa cha maandishi wakati wa mchakato wa mafunzo unaojisimamia na unaosimamiwa kidogo.

af.definition: ’n Rekenaarmodel wat taal kan genereer of ander take met natuurlike taalverwerking kan uitvoer. As taalmodelle verkry GTM’e hierdie vermoëns deur statistiese verhoudings uit ontsaglike hoeveelhede teks te leer tydens ’n opleidingproses onder selftoesig of semitoesig.

xh.definition: Imodeli yekhompyutha ekwaziyo ukuvelisa ulwimi okanye eminye imisebenzi yokulungisa ulwimi lwendalo. Njengeemodeli zolwimi, ii-LLM zifumana obu buchule ngokufunda unxulumano lwamanani ukusuka kumthamo omkhulu wezibhalo ngexesha lenkqubo yoqeqesho oluzigadelayo noluphantsi kweliso eliphakathi.

zu.definition: Imodeli yekhompyutha ekwazi ukukhiqiza ulimi noma eminye imisebenzi yokucubungula kolimi lwemvelo. Njengamamodeli wolimi, ama-LLM athola lawa makhono ngokufunda ubuhlobo bezibalo emananini amaningi ombhalo phakathi nenqubo yokuqeqesha ozigada ngokwakho kuyo negadwa ngokwengxenye.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Large language model'

en.definition: A field of study in artificial intelligence concerned with the development and study of statistical algorithms that can learn from data and generalize to unseen data and thus perform tasks without explicit instructions.

sw.definition: Taaluma ya akiliunde inayohusiana na utayarishaji na utafiti wa algoriti za takwimu zinazoweza kujifunza kutokana na data na kujumlisha data isiyoonekana, hivyo kutekeleza majukumu bila maagizo dhahiri.

af.definition: ’n Studierigting in kunsmatige intelligensie wat ingestel is op die ontwikkeling en bestudering van statistiese algoritmes wat uit data kan leer en dit vir onbekende data kan veralgemeen, en gevolglik take sonder uitdruklike instruksies kan uitvoer.

xh.definition: Icandelo lokufunda kwi-artificial intelligence ejongene nophuhliso nokufunda ii-algorithim zamanani anokuthi afunde kwidatha kwaye enze ngokubanzi kwidatha engabonakaliyo kwaye ngaloo ndlela enze imisebenzi ngaphandle kwemiyalelo ecacileyo.

zu.definition: Inkundla yokucwaninga ebuchwephesheni bokwakhiwe egxile ekwakhekeni nasocwaningweni lwama-algorithm ezibalo engafunda kudatha futhi iyiguqulele kudatha engabonakali ngaleyo ndlela yenze imisebenzi ngaphandle kweziqondiso ezicacile.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Machine learning'

en.definition: A type of deep learning using multiple modalities of data, such as text, audio, or images.

sw.definition: Ni aina ya mafunzo ya kina kwa kutumia miundo anuai ya data, kama vile maandishi, sauti au picha.

af.definition: ’n Soort diepleer wat veelvuldige modaliteite data, soos teks, oudio of prente, gebruik.

xh.definition: Uhlobo lokufunda olunzulu usebenzisa iindela ezininzi zedatha, ezinjengemibhalo, okumanyelwayo, okanye imifanekiso.

zu.definition: Uhlobo lokufunda okujulile olusebenzisa amamodali wedatha angaphezu kweyodwa, njengombhalo, okulalelwayo, noma izithombe.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Multimodal learning'

en.definition:
An interdisciplinary subfield of computer science and artificial intelligence, primarily concerned with providing computers with the ability to process data encoded in natural language. 
Major tasks in natural language processing are speech recognition, text classification, natural-language understanding, and natural-language generation.

sw.definition:
Taaluma ndogo ya mada mbalimbali za sayansi ya kompyuta na akiliunde, ambayo kimsingi inahusiana na kuzipatia kompyuta uwezo wa kuchakata data iliyosimbwa katika lugha ya kawaida. 
 Majukumu makuu katika uchakataji wa lugha kwa matumizi ya kompyuta ni utambuzi wa matamshi, uainishaji wa maandishi, kuelewa lugha ya binadamu na utayarishaji wa lugha ya kawaida.

af.definition:
’n Interdissiplinêre subvakgebied in rekenaarwetenskap en kunsmatige intelligensie wat hoofsaaklik daarop ingestel is om aan rekenaars die vermoë te gee om data te verwerk wat in natuurlike taal geënkodeer is. 
 Belangrike take in natuurlike taalverwerking is spraakherkenning, teksklassifikasie, natuurlike taalbegrip en natuurlike taalgenerering.

xh.definition:
Indawo engaphantsi kwezifundo zenzululwazi yekhompyutha ne-artificial intelligence, yeyona nto ijongene nokubonelela iikhompyutha ngesakhono sokucubungula idatha efakwe ngekhowudi ngolwimi lwendalo. 
 Imisebenzi ephambili ekusetyenzweni kolwimi lwendalo kukunakanwa kwentetho, ukuhlelwa kwemibhalo, ukuqonda ulwimi lwendalo, nokuveliswa kolwimi lwendalo.

zu.definition:
Inkundla engaphezu kweyodwa yesayensi yekhompyutha nobuchwepheshe bokwakhiwe, egxile ngokuyinhloko ekunikezeni amakhompyutha ikhono lokucubungula idatha ebhalwe ngekhodi yolimi olungokwemvelo. 
 Imisebenzi emikhulu ekucubunguleni kolimi lwemvelo ukubonwa kwengxoxo, ukuhlunga umbhalo, ukuqonda ulimi lwemvelo, nokukhiqiza ulimi lwemvelo.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Natural language processing'

en.definition: Data with a large amount of additional meaningless information in it called noise.

sw.definition: Data iliyo na viwango vikubwa vya maelezo ya ziada yasiyo muhimu huitwa kelele.

af.definition: Data met ’n groot hoeveelheid bykomende, betekenislose inligting daarin wat geraas genoem word.

xh.definition: Idatha enesixa esikhulu senkcazelo eyongezelelweyo engenantsingiselo kuyo ibizwa ngokuba yi-noise.

zu.definition: Idatha enenani elikhulu lemininingwane engenancazelo kuyo ebizwa ngomsindo.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Noisy data'

en.definition: A prompting strategy that includes one example of the desired input and output

sw.definition: Mkakati wa kutumia vidokezo unaojumuisha mfano mmoja wa data na tokeo linalokusudiwa

af.definition: ’n Porboodskapstrategie wat een voorbeeld van die verlangde invoer en uitvoer insluit

xh.definition: Isicwangciso sokuyalela esibandakanya umzekelo omnye wento efakwayo efunekayo nesiphumo

zu.definition: Isu lomyalelo elibandakanya isibonelo esisodwa sokufakwayo nomphumela ofiselekayo

attribution.text: Adapted from a Gemini response to the prompt, 'Tell me about One-shot prompting in AI'

en.definition: A source code (a plain text computer program written in a programming language) that is made freely available for possible modification and redistribution.

sw.definition: Msimbo wa tovuti (programu ya kompyuta ya maandishi dhahiri yanayoandikwa kwa lugha ya usanidi) ambao unapatikana bila malipo ili uweze kufanyiwa maboresho au kusambazwa upya.

af.definition: ’n Bronkode (’n rekenaarprogram in skoonteks wat in ’n programmeertaal geskryf is) wat vrylik beskikbaar gestel word vir moontlike wysiging en herverspreiding.

xh.definition: Ikhowudi yomthombo (inkqubo yekhompyutha ebhaliweyo ecacileyo ebhalwe ngolwimi lwenkqubo) eyenziwe ifumaneke ngokukhululekileyo ukuze ikwazi ukuguqulwa nokusasazwa kwakhona.

zu.definition: Ikhodi yomthombo (uhlelo lwekhompyutha lombhalo ongenalutho olubhalwe ngolimi lweprogramming) etholakala mahhala ukuze iguqulwe futhi isakazwe kabusha.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Source code'

en.definition: The information or creative work that an AI tool produces after it is prompted, such as an answer to a question, a text summary, an image, or a piece of music

sw.definition: Maelezo au ubunifu ambao zana ya AI hutayarisha baada ya kupewa kidokezo, kama vile jibu la swali, muhtasari wa maandishi, picha au maudhui ya muziki

af.definition: Die inligting of kreatiewe werk wat ’n AI-nutsding lewer nadat dit gepor is, soos ’n antwoord op ’n vraag, ’n teksopsomming, ’n prent of ’n stuk musiek

xh.definition: Inkcazelo okanye umsebenzi wokudala oveliswa sisixhobo se-AI emva kokuyalelwa, njengempendulo yombuzo, isishwankathelo sombhalo, umfanekiso, okanye isiqwenga somculo

zu.definition: Imininingwane noma umsebenzi wobuciko okhiqizwa yithuluzi le-AI ngemva komyalelo, njengempendulo embuzweni, isifinyezo sombhalo, isithombe, noma umculo

attribution.text: Adapted from a Gemini response to the prompt, 'Tell me about Output in AI'

en.definition: An instruction, usually expressed in natural language, used to get the desired output from a generative AI engine.

sw.definition: Maagizo, ambayo hufafanuliwa katika lugha ya kawaida, yanayotumika kupata matokeo yanayokusudiwa kupitia mfumo wa AI zalishi.

af.definition: ’n Instruksie, gewoonlik uitgedruk in natuurlike taal, wat gebruik word om die verlangde uitvoer van ’n generatiewe-AI-enjin te kry.

xh.definition: Umyalelo, odla ngokuchazwa ngolwimi lwendalo, osetyenziselwa ukufumana imveliso efunekayo kwi-injini ye-AI yokuvelisa.

zu.definition: Isiqondiso, ngokuvamile esivezwa ngolimi olungokwemvelo, esisetshenziselwa ukuthola umphumela ofiswayo enjinini ye-AI ekhiqizayo.

attribution.text: Adapted from a Gemini response to the prompt, 'Tell me about Prompt   in AI'

en.definition: The process of structuring an instruction that can be interpreted and understood by a generative AI model.

sw.definition: Mchakato wa kuunda maagizo ambayo mfumo wa AI zalishi unaweza kufafanua na kuelewa.

af.definition: Die proses om ’n instruksie te struktureer wat deur ’n generatiewe-AI-model geïnterpreteer en verstaan kan word.

xh.definition: Inkqubo yokumisela umyalelo onokutolikwa uze uqondwe yimodeli ye-AI yokuvelisa.

zu.definition: Inqubo yokwakha umyalelo ongase uchazwe futhi uqondwe yimodeli ye-AI ekhiqizayo.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Prompt engineering'

en.definition: The process of obscuring data with the ability to re-identify it later. Personally identifiable information fields within a data record are replaced by one or more artificial identifiers, or pseudonyms.

sw.definition: Mchakato wa kuficha data ikiwa na uwezo wa kuitambua tena baadaye. Nafasi za sehemu za taarifa zinazoweza kumtambulisha mtu kibinafsi ndani ya rekodi ya data huchukuliwa na vipengee vya kuficha utambulisho wa data au kitambulishi kimoja bandia au zaidi.

af.definition: Die proses om data te verdoesel met die vermoë om dit later te heridentifiseer. Velde met persoonlik identifiseerbare inligting in ’n datarekord word vervang met een of meer kunsmatige identifiseerders, of pseudonieme.

xh.definition: Inkqubo yokufihla idatha nokwazi ukuyichonga kwakhona kamva. Indawo yenkcazelo echongiweyo ngokobuqu kwirekhodi yedatha ethathelwe indawo sisifanisi esinye, okanye ngapezulu, okanye ii-pseudonym.

zu.definition: Inqubo yokufihla idatha ngendlela yokukwazi ukuyibona futhi kamuva. Izinkundla zolwazi olukhomba umuntu siqu (PII) erekhodini ledatha ziyakhishwa kufakwe izinkomba zokwenziwa ezizodwa noma ngaphezulu, noma amapseudonyms.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Pseudonymization'

en.definition: Also known as primary data, are data (e.g., numbers, instrument readings, figures, etc.) collected from a source, prior to cleaning or analysis.

sw.definition: Pia hujulikana kama data ya msingi, ni data (k.m., namba, vipimo vya vifaa, tarakimu, n.k.) iliyokusanywa kutoka katika chanzo kabla ya kuichambua au kuchanganua.

af.definition: Ook bekend as primêre data – dit is data (byvoorbeeld nommers, instrumentlesings, syfers, ensovoorts) wat van ’n bron af ingesamel is, voordat dit opgeruim of ontleed is.

xh.definition: Ekwabizwa ngokuba yidatha yangaphambili, yidatha (umzekelo, amanani, ukufundwa kwezixhobo, amanani, njalo-njalo.) eqokelelwe kumthombo ngaphambi kokucoca okanye uhlalutyo.

zu.definition: Yaziwa nangokuthi idatha eyinhloko, iyidatha (isib., izinombolo, ukufundwa kwethuluzi, izinombolo, njll.) eqongelelwa emthonjeni, ngaphambi kokuhlanza noma ukuhlaziya.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Raw data'

en.definition: An interdisciplinary area of machine learning and optimal control concerned with how an intelligent agent ought to take actions in a dynamic environment in order to maximize the cumulative reward.

sw.definition: Taaluma anuai ya mashine kujifunza na udhibiti bora unaohusiana na jinsi ambavyo kipengee mahiri kinapaswa kuchukua hatua katika mazingira nyumbufu ili kuongeza jumla ya mafanikio.

af.definition: ’n Interdissiplinêre terrein van masjienleer en optimale beheer wat gemoeid is met hoe ’n intelligente agent in ’n dinamiese omgewing behoort op te tree om die kumulatiewe beloning so groot moontlik te maak.

xh.definition: Icandelo lokufunda koomatshini nolawulo olufanelekileyo olunenkxalabo ngendlela iarhente ekrelekrele ekufuneka ithathe ngayo amanyathelo kwindawo eguqukayo ukuze kwandiswe umvuzo owongezelekayo.

zu.definition: Indawo engaphezu kweyodwa yokufunda komshini nokulawula okuthuthukisiwe okugxile endleleni i-ejenti ehlakaniphile okufanele ithathe ngayo izinyathelo endaweni eshintshashintshayo ukuze kuthuthukiswe umvuzo oqongelelwe.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Reinforcement learning'

en.definition: The interdisciplinary study and practice of the design, construction, operation, and use of robots (a machine—especially one programmable by a computer—capable of carrying out a complex series of actions automatically).

sw.definition: Taaluma ya mada anuai na mbinu ya kubuni, kutengeneza, kuendesha na kutumia roboti (mashine—hasa ile inayoendeshwa na kompyuta—yenye uwezo wa kutekeleza kiotomatiki mifuatano changamano ya vitendo).

af.definition: Die interdissiplinêre bestudering en toepassing van die ontwerp, konstruksie, bedryf en gebruik van robotte (’n masjien – veral een wat deur ’n rekenaar geprogrammeer kan word – wat in staat is om ’n komplekse reeks handelinge outomaties uit te voer).

xh.definition: Uphononongo lwezifundo ezahlukahlukeneyo nokusebenza koyilo, ukwakhiwa, ukusebenza, kunye nokusetyenziswa kweerobhothi (umatshini–ngakumbi omnye ocwangciswayo yikhompyutha–ekwaziyo ukwenza uluhlu olunzima lwezenzo ngokuzenzekelayo).

zu.definition: Ucwaningo olungaphezu kolulodwa nomsebenzi wedizayini, ukwakha, ukusebenza, nokusetshenziswa kwamarobhothi (umshini—ikakhulu ongahlelwa yikhompyutha—okwazi ukufeza uchungechunge lwezenzo eziyinkimbinkimbi ngokuzenzekelayo).

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Robotics'

en.definition: An interdisciplinary subfield of computer science and computational linguistics that develops methodologies and technologies that enable the recognition and translation of spoken language into text by computers.

sw.definition: Taaluma ndogo inayohusisha mada anuai za sayansi ya kompyuta na ukokotoaji wa lugha kwa kutumia kompyuta ambao unabuni mbinu na teknolojia zinazowezesha kutambua na kutafsiri lugha inayozungumzwa kuwa maandishi kupitia kompyuta.

af.definition: ’n Interdissiplinêre subvakgebied van rekenaarwetenskap en rekenaarlinguistiek wat metodologieë en tegnologieë ontwikkel wat die herkenning en vertaling van gesproke taal in teks deur rekenaars moontlik maak.

xh.definition: Icandelo elingaphantsi kwezifundo ezahlukeneyo zenzululwazi yekhompyutha neelwimi zekhompyutha eziphuhlisa iindlela nobuchwepheshe obuvumela ukuqondwa nokuguqulelwa kolwimi oluthethwayo kwisicatshulwa ngeekhompyutha.

zu.definition: Inkundla engaphezu kweyodwa yesayensi yekhompyutha nolimi lwekhompyutha olusungula izindlela nobuchwepheshe obuvumela ukuqashelwa nokuhunyushwa kolimi olukhulunywayo ngombhalo emakhompyutheni.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Speech recognition'

en.definition: A paradigm in machine learning where input objects and a desired output value train a model.

sw.definition: Nadharia katika mchakato wa mashine kujifunza ambapo vipengee vya data na matokeo yanayokusudiwa hufunza mfumo.

af.definition: ’n Paradigma in masjienleer waar invoervoorwerpe en ’n verlangde uitvoerwaarde ’n model oplei.

xh.definition: I-paradigm ekufundeni koomatshini apho izinto ezifakwayo nexabiso elifunekayo lemveliso liqeqesha imodeli.

zu.definition: Isibonelo sokufunda komshini lapho izinto ezifakwayo nenani lomphumela ofiswayo ziqeqesha imodeli.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Supervised learning'

en.definition: A catch-all term for the artificial production, manipulation, and modification of data and media by automated means, especially through the use of artificial intelligence algorithms, such as for the purpose of misleading people or changing an original meaning. Also known as AI-generated media.

sw.definition: Istilahi inayohusisha michakato yote ya uundaji bandia, urekebishaji na ubadilishaji wa data na maudhui kwa njia ya kiotomatiki, hususani kupitia matumizi ya algoriti za akiliunde, kama vile kwa madhumuni ya kupotosha watu au kubadilisha maana halisi. Pia hujulikana kama maudhui yaliyotayarishwa kwa AI.

af.definition: ’n Versamelterm vir die kunsmatige produksie, manipulasie en modifikasie van data en media deur geoutomatiseerde metodes, veral deur die gebruik van algoritmes met kunsmatige intelligensie, soos met die doel om mense te mislei of om ’n oorspronklike betekenis te verander. Ook bekend as AI-gegenereerde media.

xh.definition: Intetho ehlala isetyenziswa yemveliso eyenziweyo , ukwenziwa nokuguqulwa kwedatha kunye nemidiya ngeendlela ezizenzekelayo, ngokukodwa ngokusetyenziswa kwee-algorithms ze-artificial intelligence, njengenjongo yokulahlekisa abantu okanye ukutshintsha intsingiselo yangaphambili. Ekwabizwa ngokuba yimidiya eveliswe yi-AI.

zu.definition: Itemu elihlanganisa konke lomkhiqizo owakhiwe, ukufuzisela, nokuguqulwa kwedatha nemidiya ngokuzenzakalelayo, ikakhulu ngokusebenzisa ama-algorithms wobuchwepheshe bokwakhiwe, ngenjongo yokudukisa abantu noma ukushintsha incazelo yasekuqaleni. Yaziwa nangokuthi yimidiya ekhiqizwe yi-AI.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Synthetic media'

en.definition: Transfer learning (TL) is a technique in machine learning (ML) in which knowledge learned from a task is re-used in order to boost performance on a related task.[1] For example, for image classification, knowledge gained while learning to recognize cars could be applied when trying to recognize trucks.

sw.definition: Kuhamisha mafunzo (TL) ni mbinu inayotumika katika mchakato wa mashine kujifunza (ML) ambapo ujuzi unaotokana na jukumu unatumika tena ili kuboresha utendaji kwenye jukumu linalohusiana.[1] Kwa mfano, katika uainishaji wa picha, ujuzi unaopatikana wakati wa kujifunza ili kutambua magari madogo unaweza kutumika mfumo unapojaribu kutambua malori.

af.definition: Oordragleer (OL) is ’n tegniek in masjienleer (ML) waarin kennis wat uit ’n taak geleer is, weer gebruik word om die prestasie met ’n verwante taak te verbeter.[1] Byvoorbeeld, vir prentklassifikasie kan die kennis wat verkry is terwyl daar geleer is om motors te herken, toegepas word wanneer daar geprobeer word om vragmotors te herken.

xh.definition: Ukufunda okudluliswayo (TL) bubuchule ekufundeni koomatshini (ML) apho ulwazi olufundwe kumsebenzi luphinda lusetyenziswe ukuze kunyuswe ukusebenza komsebenzi onxulumeneyo.[1] Umzekelo, kuhlelo lwemifanekiso, ulwazi olufunyenwe ngelixa ufunda ukuqaphela iimoto lunokusetyenziswa xa kuzanywa ukuqatshelwa iilori.

zu.definition: Ukufunda kokudlulisela (TL) ingubuciko ekufundeni komshini (ML) lapho ulwazi olutholwe emsebenzini lusetshenziswa kabusha ukuze kuthuthukiswe ukusebenza komsebenzi ohlobene.[1] Ngokwesibonelo, ekuhlungeni isithombe, ulwazi olutholwe ngesikhathi kufundwa ukuqaphela izimoto lungasebenza uma kuzanywa ukuqaphela amaloli.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Transfer learning'

en.definition: A framework in machine learning where, in contrast to supervised learning, algorithms learn patterns exclusively from unlabeled data.

sw.definition: Mfumo unaotumika katika mchakato wa mashine kujifunza ambapo, tofauti na mafunzo yanayosimamiwa, algoriti hujifunza mitindo kwa upekee kupitia data isiyo na lebo.

af.definition: ’n Raamwerk in masjienleer waar – anders as met leer onder toesig – algoritmes patrone eksklusief uit ongemerkte data leer.

xh.definition: Isakhelo ekufundweni koomatshini apho, ngokuchaseneyo nokufunda okugadiweyo, ii-algorithm zifunda iipateni ngokukodwa kwiidatha ezingabhalwanga.

zu.definition: Ifremuwekhi ekufundeni komshini lapho, ngokungafani nokufunda okugadiwe, ama-algorithms afunda amaphethini ngokukhethekile kudatha engenalebula.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Unsupervised learning'

en.definition: A prompting strategy that doesn’t include any examples about the desired input and output

sw.definition: Mkakati wa kutumia udokezaji usiojumuisha mifano yoyote kuhusu data na tokeo linalokusudiwa

af.definition: ’n Porboodskapstrategie wat geen voorbeelde van die verlangde invoer en uitvoer insluit nie

xh.definition: Isicwangiso sokuyalela esingabandakanyi nayiphi na imizekelo ngokufakwayo okufunekayo nesiphumo.

zu.definition: Isu lokukhumbuza elingabandakanyi noma iziphi izibonelo ezimayelana nokufakwayo kanye nomphumela ofiswayo

attribution.text: Adapted from a Gemini response to the prompt, 'Tell me about Zero-shot prompting in AI'

en.definition: A statistical way of comparing two (or more) techniques—the A and the B. Typically, the A is an existing technique, and the B is a new technique. A/B testing not only determines which technique performs better but also whether the difference is statistically significant.

sw.definition: Ni njia ya kitakwimu wa kulinganisha mitindo miwili (au zaidi)—A na B. Kwa kawaida A ndio mtindo uliopo na B ni mtindo mpya. Jaribio la A/B hupima ili kubaini ni mbinu gani ina utendaji bora, lakini pia, ikiwa kuna tofauti yoyote kubwa ya kitakwimu kati ya mbinu hizo.

af.definition: ’n Statistiese manier om twee (of meer) tegnieke te vergelyk - die A en die B. Gewoonlik is die A ’n bestaande tegniek en die B ’n nuwe tegniek. A/B-toetse bepaal nie net watter tegniek beter presteer nie, maar ook of die verskil wel statisties relevant is.

xh.definition: Indlela yezibalo yokuthelekisa iindlela ezimbini (okanye ngaphezulu)-i-A kunye ne-B. Ngokuqhelekileyo, i-A yinkqubo ekhoyo, kwaye i-B yindlela entsha. Uvavanyo lwe-A/B alubonisi nje kuphela ukuba boluphi na ubugcisa obusebenza ngcono kodwa nokuba umahluko ubalulekile ngokwezibalo.

zu.definition: Indlela yezibalo yokuqhathanisa izindlela - u-A kanye no-B. Ngokujwayelekile, u-A uyindlela ekhona, bese u-B abe yindlela entsha. Ukuhlola kwe-A/B akugcini ngokunquma ukuthi iyiphi indlela esebenza kangcono kodwa nokuthi umehluko wezibalo ubalulekile na.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Google for Developers, Machine Learning Glossary entry 'Ab Testing'

en.definition: In artificial intelligence (AI), particularly machine learning (ML), ablation is the removal of a component of an AI system. An ablation study investigates the performance of an AI system by removing certain components to understand the contribution of the component to the overall system.

sw.definition: Katika fani ya akiliunde, hasa mashine kujifunza, kumomonyoa ni kuondoa kipengele cha mfumo wa akiliunde. Utafiti wa kumomonyoa huchunguza utendaji wa mfumo wa akiliunde kwa kuodoa baadhi ya vipengele ili kuelewa mchango wa vipengele hivyo katika mfumo mzima.

af.definition: In kunsmatige intelligensie (KI), spesifiek masjienleer (ML), is ablasie die verwydering van ’n komponent van ’n KI-stelsel. ’n Ablasiestudie ondersoek die werkverrigting van ’n KI-stelsel deur sekere komponente te verwyder om die bydrae van die komponent tot die algehele stelsel te verstaan.

xh.definition: Kubukrelekrele obenziweyo (iAI), ngokukodwa ukufundwa komatshini (ML), ukukhutshwa kukukhutshwa kwecandelo lenkqubo yeAI. Uphononongo lokuchithwa luphanda ukusebenza kwenkqubo yeAI ngokususa amacandelo athile ukuqonda igalelo lecandelo kwinkqubo yonke.

zu.definition: Ubuchwepheshe obusebenza ngokungasikho okwemvelo (i-AI), ikakhulukazi ukufunda ngomshini (i-ML), ukukhipha izakhi zohlelo lwe-AI. Ucwaningo lwezakhi luhlola ukusebenza kohlelo lwe-AI ngokususa izakhi ezithile ukuze uqonde igalelo lezakhi ohlelweni lulonke.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Ablation (artificial intelligence)'

en.definition: In computing, adoption means the transfer (conversion) between an old system and a target system in an organization (or more broadly, by anyone). In regard to AI, it means using artificial intelligence to improve workflows and decision-making processes

sw.definition: Katika masuala ya kikompyuta, ukumbatiaji unarejelea kuhamisha (ugeuzaji) kati ya mfumo wa zamani na mfumo unaolengwa katika shirika (au kwa upana, kwa mtu yeyote). Katika ulingo wa AI, inamaanisha utumiaji wa akiliunde ili kuboresha utendaji kikazi na michakato ya kufanya uamuzi

af.definition: In rekenaarwese beteken ingebruikneming die oordrag (omskakeling) tussen ’n ou stelsel en ’n teikenstelsel in ’n organisasie (of wyer nog, deur enigiemand). Met betrekking tot KI beteken dit dat kunsmatige intelligensie gebruik word om werkvloei en besluitnemingprosesse te verbeter.

xh.definition: Ekusebenzeni kweekhompyutha, uguqulelo luthetha ukudluliselwa (ukuguqulwa) phakathi kwenkqubo endala nenkqubo eyithagethi  kwintlangano (okanye ngokubanzi, nguye nabani na). Ngokuphathelele iAI, kuthetha ukusebenzisa ubukrelekrele obenziweyo ukuze kuphuculwe ukuhamba komsebenzi neenkqubo zokwenza izigqibo.

zu.definition: Kwezocwaningo lwamakhompyutha, ukuguqukela kusho ukudlulisa (ukushintsha) usuke ohlelweni oludala kanye nohlelo okuphokophelwe kulo esikhungweni (noma kabanzi, okwenziwa yinoma wubani). Maqondana ne-AI, kusho ukusebenzisa ubuchwephe obusebenza ngokungasikho okwemvelo ukuthuthukisa umsebenzi kanye nezinqubo zokuthatha izinqumo

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Software adoption'

en.definition: In machine learning, this is the process of using machine learning models to identify anomalies rapidly. This serves several purposes, whether to maintain clean, high-quality data that you will use for processing or specific business purposes.

sw.definition: Katika mashine kujifunza, huu ni mchakato wa kutumia mifumo ya mashine kujifunza kutambua hali zisizo za kawaida kwa haraka. Huwa na malengo kadhaa, iwe ni kudumisha data ya ubora wa juu utakayotumia katika uchakataji au kwa malengo mahususi ya kibiashara.

af.definition: In masjienleer is dit die proses waardeur masjienleermodelle gebruik word om onreëlmatighede vinnig te identifiseer. Dit dien verskeie doele, onder andere die behoud van skoon, hoëgehaltedata wat gebruik word vir prosessering of spesifieke besigheidsdoeleindes.

xh.definition: Ukufunda koomatshini, le yinkqubo yokusebenzisa iimodeli zokufunda ngoomatshini ukuchonga izinto ezingaqhelekanga ngokukhawuleza. Oku kusebenzela iinjongo ezininzi, nokuba kukugcina idatha ecocekileyo, ekumgangatho ophezulu oya kuyisebenzisela ukuprosesa okanye iinjongo ezithile zoshishino.

zu.definition: Ekufundeni ngemishini, lokhu kuyinqubo yokusebenzisa izinhlelo zokufunda ngemishini sokuhlonza okungavamile ngokushesha. Lokhu kusebenza ngokwezinhloso ezihlukene, okungaba wukugcina imininingwane engenasici, eseqophelweni eliphezulu ozoyisebenzisela ukulungisa noma izinhloso zebhizinisi ezibaluliwe.

en.definition: A non-human mechanism that demonstrates a broad range of problem solving, creativity, and adaptability. For example, a program demonstrating artificial general intelligence could translate text, compose symphonies, and excel at games that have not yet been invented.

sw.definition: Mfumo usio wa kibinadamu ulio na uwezo mpana wa kutatua matatizo, kuwa na ubunifu na unyumbufu. Kwa mfano, mfumo ulio na akiliunde yenye utashi unaweza kutafsiri matini, ukatunga muziki na kufanya vyema katika michezo ambayo hata haijavumbuliwa.

af.definition: ’n Niemenslike meganisme wat ’n algemene, wye reeks probleemoplossing, kreatiwiteit en aanpasbaarheid demonstreer. Byvoorbeeld, ’n program wat kunsmatige intelligensie demonstreer kan teks vertaal, simfonieë komponeer en uitblink in speletjies wat nog nie geskep is nie.

xh.definition: Indlela engeyoyamntu ebonisa uluhlu olubanzi lokusombulula iingxaki, ukuyila,  nokuguquguquka. Umzekelo, iprogramu ebonisa ubukrelekrele obenziweyo ngokubanzi  bunokuguqulela umbhalo, buqambe iisimfoni, buze bugqwese kwimidlalo engekaveliswa.

zu.definition: Inqubo engeziwa abantu yokuveza uhla olubanzi lokuxazulula inkinga, ubuciko, kanye nokuhambisana nezimo. Isibonelo, uhlelo olubonisa ubuchwepheshe obusebenza ngokungasikho okwemvelo jikelele obungakwazi ukuhumusha umbhalo, buqambe imiculo, futhi buhambe phambili emidlalweni engakasungulwa.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Google for Developers, Machine Learning Glossary entry 'Artificial General Intelligence'

en.definition: Narrow AI can be classified as being “limited to a single, narrowly defined task. Most modern AI systems would be classified in this category.” Some examples of narrow AI are self-driving cars and robot systems used in the medical field.

sw.definition: Akiliunde yenye Umahususi unafasiliwa kuwa “mifumo ya akiliunde inayotekeleza jukumu moja lililobainishwa. Mifumo mingi ya akiliunde ya kisasa inaweza kupatikana katika aina hii.” Mifano ya akiliunde yenye umahuusi ni magari yanayojiendesha na mifumo ya roboti zinazotumika katika matibabu.

af.definition: Beperkte KI kan geklassifiseer word as "beperk tot ’n enkel, noukeurig gedefinieerde taak". Meeste moderne KI-stelsels sal in hierdie kategorie geklassifiseer word". ’n Paar voorbeelde van beperkte KI is selfbestuurkarre en robotstelsels wat in die mediese veld gebruik word.

xh.definition: I-AI Emxinwa inokuhlelwa “njengesikelwe umda kumsebenzi omnye ochaziweyo. Uninzi lweenkqubo ze-AI zanamhlanje zingahlelwa kolu didi". Eminye imizekelo ye-AI emxinwa ziimoto eziziqhubayo neenkqubo zerobhothi ezisetyenziswa kwicandelo lezonyango.

zu.definition: I-AI encinyanane okungathiwa "inomkhawulo wokwenza umsebenzi owodwa umcinyane ochaziwe. Izinhlelo ze-AI zesimanje eziningi zingafakwa kulesi sigaba." Ezinye izibonelo zobuchwepheshe obusebenza ngokungasikho okwemvelo obuncinyane yizimoto ezimoto ezizishayelayo kanye nezinhlelo zamarobhothi ezisetshenziswa emkhakheni wezokwelapha.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Weak artificial intelligence'

en.definition: Automated machine learning (AutoML) is the process of automating the tasks of applying machine learning to real-world problems. It is the combination of automation and ML.

sw.definition: Mashine Kujifunza Kiotomatiki (AutoML) ni mchakato wa kufanya mitambo ijiendeshe kwa kutumia uwezo wa mashine kujifunza katika majukumu ya ulimwengu halisi. Ni utumiaji wa fani ya mitambo kujiuendesha na mashine kujifunza kwa pamoja.

af.definition: Outomatiese masjienleer (OutoML) is die proses waardeur die take waarin masjienleer op regtewêreldprobleme toegepas word, geoutomatiseer word. Dis die kombinasie van outomatisering en masjienleer.

xh.definition: Ukufunda ngomatshini ngokuzenzekelayo (iAutoML) yinkqubo yokuzenzela imisebenzi yokufaka umatshini wokufunda kwiingxaki zehlabathi lokwenyani. Yindibaniselwano yokuzenzela neML.

zu.definition: Ufunda kwemishini ngokuzenzekela (i-AutoML) yinqubo yokuhlela ukuba imisebenzi izenzekele usebenzisa ukufunda kwemishini ezinkingeni zasemhlabeni zangempela. Kuhlanganisa ukuzenzekela kanye ne-ML.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Automated machine learning'

en.definition: Primarily refers to data sets that are too large or complex to be dealt with by traditional data-processing application software. Big data usually includes data sets with sizes beyond the ability of commonly used software tools to capture, curate, manage, and process data within a tolerable elapsed time.

sw.definition: Kimsingi ni mkusanyiko mkubwa au changamano wa data ambao hauwezi kushughulikiwa kwa programu za kawaida za kuchakata data. Kwa kawaida data lukuki huwa mkusanyiko wa data unaozidi uwezo wa zana za kawaida za kunakili, kukusanya, kudhibiti na kuchakata data katika kipindi kinachoweza kuvumilika.

af.definition: Verwys hoofsaaklik na datastelle wat te groot of kompleks is om deur tradisionele appsagteware vir dataprosessering gehanteer te word. Grootdata sluit gewoonlik datastelle in met groottes bó die vermoëns van sagtewarenutsgoed wat gewoonlik gebruik word om data binne ’n draaglike tydsduur vas te vang, saam te stel, te bestuur en te prosesseer.

xh.definition: Ngokuyintloko ibhekisa kwiiseti zedatha ezinkulu kakhulu okanye ezintsokothileyo ukuba zingasetyenzwa ngokwesiko lenkqubo yedatha yesoftware. Idatha enkulu idla ngokubandakanya iiseti zedatha ezinobungakanani obungaphaya kwamandla ezixhobo zesoftware ezisetyenziswa ngokuqhelekileyo ukubamba, ukulungelelanisa, ukulawula, nokucwangcisa idatha kwixesha elinyamezelekayo.

zu.definition: Kusho uhlu lwemininingwane olukhulu noma oludidayo oluzobhekana nesoftiwe yohlelo lokulungisa imininingwane lakudala. Imininingwane emikhulu ibandakanya uhlu lwemininingwane enobungakho obungaphezul kwamandla eamathuluzi esoftiwe evame ukusetshenziswa okuqopha, ukuphatha, ukulawula, nokulungisa imininingwane esikhathini esidlulile esamukelekile.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Big data'

en.definition: A type of classification task that predicts one of two mutually exclusive classes: the positive class and the negative class. For example, a model that determines whether email messages are spam (the positive class) or not spam (the negative class).

sw.definition: Aina ya uainishaji wa majukumu unaobashiri tokeo moja kati ya mawili yasiyoweza kutokea kwa pamoja: upande chanya na upande hasi. Kwa mfano, mfumo unaotambua kama ujumbe wa barua pepe ni taka (upande chanya) au si taka (upande hasi).

af.definition: ’n Tipe klassifiseringtaak wat een of twee onverenigbare klassifiserings voorspel: die positiewe klas en die negatiewe klas. Byvoorbeeld, ’n model wat bepaal of ’n e-posboodskap gemorspos is (die positiewe klas) of nie gemorspos is nie (die negatiewe klas).

xh.definition: Uhlobo lomsebenzi wokuhlelwa oqikelela enye yeeklasi ezimbini ezizimeleyo: udidi oluhle kunye nodidi olubi. Umzekelo, imodeli emisela ukuba imiyalezo yeimeyile isispem (iklasi elungileyo) okanye ayisiso (udidi olubi).

zu.definition: Uhlobo lomsebenzi wokuhlukanisa ngokwamazinga oluqagela izinga elilodwa noma amabili akhethekile: amazinga okuhle kanye namazinga okubi. Isibonelo, uhlelo olunquma ukuthi ingabe imiyalelo yama-imeyli iwugaxekile (izinga lokuhle) noma akusiwo ugaxekile (izinga lokubi).

attribution.text: Adapted from the Google for Developers, Machine Learning Glossary entry 'Binary Classification'

en.definition: A term used to describe artificial intelligence systems whose internal workings and decision-making processes are opaque or not easily understandable to humans.

sw.definition: Neno linalotumika kufafanua mifumo ya akiliunde ambayo utendakazi wake wa ndani na michakato ya kufanya uamuzi si bayana au si rahisi kwa binadamu kuelewa.

af.definition: ’n Term wat gebruik word om KI-stelsels te beskryf waarvan die interne bewerkinge en besluitnemingprosesse ondeursigtig is en nie maklik deur mense verstaan kan word nie.

xh.definition: Ibinzana elisetyenziselwa ukuchaza iinkqubo zobukrelekrele obenziweyo apho iindlela zangaphakathi zokusebenza kwazo neenkqubo zazo zokwenza izigqibo zingacacanga okanye zingaqondwa lula ngabantu.

zu.definition: Itemu elisetshenziselwa ukuchaza ubuchwepheshe obusebenza ngokungasikho okwemvelo ezinezindlela zokusebenza zangaphakathi kanye nokuthatha izinqumo ezingacacile noma ezingaqondwa abantu kabula.

attribution.text: Adapted from a Gemini response to the prompt, 'Tell me about Black Box AI in AI'

en.definition: Data minimization is the principle of collecting, processing and storing only the necessary amount of personal information required for a specific purpose.

sw.definition: Kupunguza data ni kanuni inayosema kwamba kiasi cha taarifa binafsi kinachokusanywa, kuchakatwa na kuhifadhiwa kinafaa tu kuwa kinachohitajika kwa madhumuni mahususi.

af.definition: Dataminimalisering is die prinsiep waarin net die persoonlike inligting wat vir ’n spesifieke doel nodig is, ingesamel, verwerk en geberg word.

xh.definition: Ukunciphisa idatha ngumgaqo wokuqokelela, ukuprosesa nokugcina kuphela isixa esifunekayo senkcazelo yomntu efunekayo ngenjongo ethile.

zu.definition: Ukunciphisa imininingwane kuyinqubo yokuqoqa, ukulungisa nokugcina isibalo esidingekayo solwazi lomuntu siqu oludingeka ngokwenhloso ebaluliwe.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Data minimization'

en.definition: Debiasing is the reduction of bias, particularly with respect to judgment and decision making. Biased judgment and decision making is that which systematically deviates from the prescriptions of objective standards such as facts, logic, and rational behavior or prescriptive norms.

sw.definition: Kuondoa upendeleo ni mchakato wa kupunguza ubaguzi, hasa katika maoni na kufanya maamuzi. Maoni na maamuzi yenye upendeleo ni yale ambayo huenda kinyume na vigezo vilivyobainishwa vya usawa kama vile ukweli, mantiki na urazini au mwongozo wa kawaida.

af.definition: Vooroordeelverwydering is die vermindering van bevooroordeling, spesifiek met betrekking tot opinies en besluitneming. Bevooroordeelde opinies en besluitneming is dít wat stelselmatig afwyk van die voorgeskrewe objektiewe standaarde, soos feite, logikia en rasionele optrede of voorgeskrewe norme.

xh.definition: Ukunciphisa ukuthatha icala kukunciphisa umkhethe, ngakumbi ngokubhekisele kwisigwebo nokwenza izigqibo. Isigwebo nokwenziwa kwezigqibo okunomkhethe kukusuka ngokucwangcisiweyo kwimimiselo yemigangatho yenjongo efana neenyani, ingqiqo, nokuziphatha okunengqiqo okanye imigaqo emiselweyo.

zu.definition: Ukususa ukuchema kuwukunciphsa ukuchema, ikakhulukazi maqondana nokwahlulela kanye nokuthatha izinqumo. Ukwahlulela ngokungachemi kanye nokuthatha izinqumo kuyilokho okuchezuka ngokohlelo oluthile kulokho okumisiwe emigomweni yezimpokophelo njengamaqiniso, okuqondakalayo, kanye nokuziphatha ngokufanele noma izindlela ezimisiwe.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Debiasing'

en.definition: Differential privacy (DP) is a mathematically rigorous framework for releasing statistical information about datasets while protecting the privacy of individual data subjects. It enables a data holder to share aggregate patterns of the group while limiting information that is leaked about specific individuals.

sw.definition: Faragha kwa kuchanganya data ni mchakato madhubuti wa kihisabati wa kutoa taarifa za kitakwimu kuhusu mkusanyiko wa data huku faragha ya walio kwenye data hiyo ikilindwa. Humwezesha mshikilizi wa data kutuma ruwaza jumuifu ya data kuhusu kundi bila kufuchua taarifa kuhusu watu wowote mahususi.

af.definition: Differensiële privaatheid (DP) is ’n wiskundige, strawwe raamwerk vir die vrystelling van statistiese inligting oor datastelle, terwyl die privaatheid van individuele data-onderwerpe beskerm word. Dit maak dat ’n datahouer aggregaatpatrone van die groep kan deel en terselfde tyd die inligting kan beperk wat deursyfer oor die spesifieke individue.

xh.definition: Ukugcinwa kokwahlukileyo kuyimfihlo (iDP) sisikhokelo semathematika esingqongqo sokukhupha inkcazelo yeenkcukacha manani ngeeseti zedatha ngelixa kukhusela ubumfihlo bedatha yento nganye. Kuvumela umnini wedatha ukuba abelane ngeepateni ezidityanisiweyo zeqela ngelixa enciphisa inkcazelo evuzisiweyo ngabantu abathile.

zu.definition: Inqubomogomo yokwahlukanisa (i-DP) iwuhlelo olunzulu lwezibalo lokukhipha ulwazi lwezibalo ngohlu lwemininingwane kube kuvikelwa imininingwane eyimfihlo yabantu abathile. Yenza umnikazi wemininingwane akwazi ukwabelana ngamaphethini ngokwezibalo ebe enciphisa ulwazi oluputshukayo ngabantu abathile.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Differential privacy'

en.definition: Edge computing is a distributed computing model that brings computation and data storage closer to the sources of data. Edge is about processing data closer to where it's being generated, enabling processing at greater speeds and volumes, leading to greater action-led results in real time.

sw.definition: Uchakataji data ukingoni. Ni mfumo wa kikompyuta unaofanya uchakataji na uhifadhi wa data ufanyike karibu na vyanzo vya data. Unahusu kuchakata data karibu na inapozalishwa hivyo kufanikisha uchakataji mwingi kwa kasi ambao huleta matokeo mengi katika muda halisi.

af.definition: Periferale berekening is ’n verspreide berekeningmodel wat berekeninge en databerging nader aan databronne bring. Periferaal behels dat data geprosesseer word nader aan waar dit gegenereer word. Dit maak dit moontlik om teen hoër spoed en groter volumes data te prosesseer, en daardeur intyds beter handelinggedrewe resultate te kry.

xh.definition: Ukusetyenziswa kwekhompyutha emphethelweni yimodeli yekhompyutha esasazwayo ezisa ukusetyenziswa kwekhompyutha nokugcinwa kwedatha kufutshane nemithombo yedatha. Emphethelweni umalunga nokusetyenzwa kwedatha kufutshane nalapho yenziwa khona, ivumela ukuproseswa ngezantya ezinkulu nemithamo, ekhokelela kwiziphumo ezinkulu ezikhokelwa yintshukumo ngexesha lokwenyani.

zu.definition: Ucubungulokuzondeza lwukudlulisela uhlelo locwaningo lwamakhompyutha olusondeza ucwaningo nokugcinwa kolwazi ndawonye nemithombo yemininingwane. Ucubungulokusondeza lumayelana nokulungisa imininingwane ibe iseduze kwalapho ikhiqizwe khona, okwenza ukulungiswa kwayo kusheshe futhi ibe miningi, okuholela emiphumeleni ebanzi ngesikhathi sangempela.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'Edge computing'

en.definition: A result that indicates a given condition does not exist when it does. This means the algorithm generates a negative result when it should have been positive. A false negative could result in a cancerous region being overlooked, leading to a delayed diagnosis and treatment.

sw.definition: Matokoe yanayoonyesha kwamba hali fulani haipo wakati ipo. Hii ina maana kwamba algoriti imetoa matokeo hasi wakati ilifaa kutoa matokeo chanya. Ukosefu usio kweli unaweza kusababisha sehemu iliyo na saratani kutoangaziwa, hivyo kuchelewesha utambuzi na matibabu.

af.definition: ’n Uitslag wat aandui dat ’n gegewe kondisie nie bestaan nie terwyl dit wel bestaan. Dit beteken dat die algoritme ’n negatiewe resultaat genereer wanneer dit ’n positiewe een moes genereer. Byvoorbeeld, ’n vals negatief kan veroorsaak dat ’n kankeragtige area nie raakgesien word nie, wat kan lei tot vertraagde diagnose en behandeling.

xh.definition: Isiphumo esibonisa ukuba imeko echaziweyo ayikho kodwa ibe ikhona. Oku kuthetha ukuba ialgorithm ivelisa iziphumo ezinegethivu xa bekufanele ukuba ziphozithivu. Inegethivu engoyonyani inokukhokelela ekubeni ummandla onomhlaza ungahoywa, nto leyo ekhokelela kuxilongo nonyango olulibazisekileyo.

zu.definition: Umphumela oveza ukuthi isimo esithile asikho sibe sikhona. Lokhu kusho ukuthi i-algorithm ikhiqiza umphumela omubi kube kumele ikhiphe omuhle. Umphumelakukhohlisa ungadala ukuthi indawo enomdlavuza inganakwa, okuholela ekuphuzeni kokutholakala nokwelashwa kwesifo.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'False positives and false negatives'

en.definition: A result that indicates a given condition does exist when it does not. For instance, in a medical imaging scenario, a false positive might lead to a healthy region being flagged as cancerous, potentially causing unnecessary concern and medical procedures for the patient.

sw.definition: Matokeo yanayoonyesha kwamba hali fulani ipo wakati haipo. Kwa mfano, katika muktadha wa kupiga picha za kimatibabu, usahihi usio kweli unaweza kufanya sehemu isiyo na maambukizi kuainishwa kwamba ina saratani, hivyo kusababisha wasiwasi usio na msingi na matibabu yasiyo ya lazima kwa mgonjwa.

af.definition: ’n Uitslag wat aandui dat ’n gegewe kondisie bestaan terwyl dit nie bestaan nie. Byvoorbeeld, in ’n mediesebeeldscenario kan ’n vals positief veroorsaak dat ’n gesonde area gevlag word as kankeragtig, wat onnodige bekommernis en mediese prosedures vir die pasient kan veroorsaak.

xh.definition: Isiphumo esibonisa ukuba imeko echaziweyo ikhona kodwa ibe ingekho. Umzekelo, kwimeko yomfanekiso wezonyango, iphozithivu ongeyonyani unokukhokelela ekubeni ummandla osempilweni kuthiwe unomhlaza, nto leyo enokubangela inkxalabo neenkqubo zonyango ezingeyomfuneko kwisigulana.

zu.definition: Umphumela oveza ukuthi isimo esibaluliwe sikhona sibe singekho. Isibonelo, lapho kuskenwa umzimba ukuze welashwe, umphumela wokuhle oyinkohliso ungaholela ekutheni indawo ephilile kuthiwe inomdlavuza, okungadala ukukhathazeka kanye nequbo yokwelashwa kwesidingo kungenasidingo.

attribution.text: Adapted from the Wikipedia article 'False positives and false negatives'

en.definition: A distributed machine learning approach that trains machine learning models using decentralized examples residing on devices such as smartphones. In federated learning, a subset of devices downloads the current model from a central coordinating server. The devices use the examples stored on the devices to make improvements to the model. The devices then upload the model improvements (but not the training examples) to the coordinating server, where they are aggregated with other updates to yield an improved global model.

sw.definition: Mfumo wa mashine kujifunza uliogatuliwa huchukua mkondo wa mashine kujifunza kwa kutumia mifano iliyosambazwa kwenye vifaa mbalimbali kama vile simu mahiri. Katika mafunzo yaliyogatuliwa, kundi fulani la vifaa hupakua mfumo uliopo kutoka kwenye seva kuu ya kuratibu. Kisha vifaa hivyo hutumia mifano inayohifadhiwa kwenye vifaa vyenyewe kuboresha mfumo. Baadaye vifaa hivyo hupakia maboresho ya mfumo (bali si mifano ile ya kufundishia) kwenye seva kuu ya kuratibu, ambapo maboresho hayo hujumlishwa na masasisho mengine ili kuboresha mfumo mkuu.

af.definition: ’n Verspreide masjienleerbenadering wat masjienleermodelle oplei met gedesentraliseerde voorbeelde wat op toestelle soos slimfone gestoor is. In gefedereerde leer laai ’n substel toestelle die huidige model van ’n sentrale, koördineringbediener af. Die toestelle gebruik die voorbeelde wat op die toestelle gestoor is om verbeteringe aan die model te maak.
